description: {x
The sewer tunnel comes to an end here at a solid brick
wall that weeps with sewer condensation.  To the south
a group of misshapen bricks sits in a pile.  Algae and
slime coat the walls in long strands and the scent of
raw sewage hangs in the darkness.
42045.name: End of the Tunnel in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The corridor here isn't quite as long as other sections,
but it is certainly much colder.  Flickering torches line
the walls, casting shadows against the dried mortar that
sticks out from the bricks.  Broken crates lay on the floor,
littering the walkway.
{x
42075.name: Along the Corridor

description: {x
The tunnels diverge here, creating a T-junction in the sewer
system that goes north, east, and west.  Echoes of the vermin
that populate the tunnels come from everywhere at once, blended
together with the stench of raw sewage that hangs thickly in
the air.
42042.name: T-Junction in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The tunnel made of rough-hewn stone seems to stretch
even longer here.  The chill grows just a bit deeper,
filling the air along with the scent of earth and sweat.
The ground is littered with rubble that has fallen from
the stone crafting as well as erosion.
42052.name: An Ever Deepening Tunnel

description: {x
The sewer tunnel dead ends here at a brick wall that is thick
with the slime of algae and sewage.  Water trickles down its
surface, joining with the sewage that exits through a grate and
leaves the sewer system to join the river beyond.  This grate
is the only hint of fresh air this system ever receives.
42039.name: End of the Tunnel in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The massive sewer tunnel spreads to the north and south, filled
to the limit with the stench of raw sewage, garbage, and the
smell of death and decay.  A channel runs in the center of the
tunnel for the sewage to collect and be funnelled out and to the
rivers beyond.
42013.name: A Tunnel in the Sewer

description: {x
The massive sewer tunnel curves here to the north and the west
in the darkness.  Sewage runs in channels in the center of the
tunnel, raising an incredible stench.  Echoes of water and the
scurrying of rodent feet can be heard as though coming from
everywhere at once.
42026.name: A Bend in the Tunnel

description: {x
The red-brick corridor stretches east and west and holds within
it a chill not unlike that of a cellar.  Mortar hangs out of the
brickwork in thickly dried clumps which cast shadows in the light
of the torches.  Crates and Barrels litter the corridor.
42066.name: A Long Winding Corridor

description: {x
The sewer tunnels split here, going north, east, and west.
Sewage in the center channel flows toward the west with
gathering speed - full of waste, garbage, and dead rats.
The smell here is thick and foul enough to choke any un-
familiar with its scent.
42034.name: T-Junction in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The passageway extends here, seeming to retain the same level
walking surface as the rest of the tunnel.  There is no telling
whether one is making any kind of headway.  The underground
chill hangs in the air, accompanied by the scent of earth,
stone, and sweat.
42058.name: A Stretch in the Stone Corridor

description: {x
A heavily brick and mortared wall sits here, seeping with
water and slime from algae.  Echoes of water and the scurry
of vermin seems to come from all directions.  Raw sewage
collects in a channel at the center of the tunnel to be
funnelled away to the river.
42028.name: End of the Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
This massive tunnel runs beneath the Survival Pack Factory and
is dark as pitch.  The stench of sewage and trash is thick in
the air and threatens to permeate any fabric for eternity.  A
tube sits to the north, a flume for the waste from the factory
above.  In the center of the tunnel is a channel for all waste
to collect and be funneled away.
42003.name: Beneath the Factory

description: {x
The brick corridor gets quite narrow at this point and
the bricks seem haphazardly placed.  The mortar has dried
in sloppy patterns on the walls, looking as though no one
ever bothered to consider a neat job.  Very few torches
light the rest of the way.
{x
42078.name: A Turn in the Deep Corridor

description: {YA br{Wig{Yht orb of {Rfi{Wr{Re {Ylights the curve of the sewer tunnel.{x
{YA br{Wig{Yht orb of {Rfi{Wr{Re {Ylights the curve of the sewer tunnel.{x
{x
The massive sewer tunnel bends here, known only by the single floating
orb of fire that lights the curve.  A deep channel of sewage runs in
the center of the tunnel, full of debris from above and from the bowels
of the citizenry.  The darkness grows as the tunnel travels to the east.
42002.name: Bend in the Tunnel

description: {x
The sewer tunnel bends here, heading south and west.  An
occasional growl can be heard as though coming from the
bowels of the sewer itself.  The stench of sewage and decay
hangs on the very air, making it difficult to breathe.
42032.name: A Bend in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The tunnel ends here in a brick wall coated by a thick
sludge of water and algae and who knows what else.  The
stench of sewage and garbage clings to the air and sits
heavily with the darkness that sits over everything like
a funeral pall.
42029.name: End of the Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
The tunnel comes to an abrupt end here at a brick wall that
weeps with water, slime, and algae.  The darkness here is just
as thick as the rest of the sewer system and smells just as
foul.  A channel in the center of the tunnel serves to rush
sewage away toward a grate and onward to the river.
42025.name: End of the Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
The massive tunnel terminates here.  Above is a manhole
that is accessed by a long steel ladder.  Droplets of
water seep down from the hole above and drip into the
stream of sewage and debris that runs in the center of
the sewer.
42030.name: End of the Tunnel

description: {x
The subterranean corridor curves here, jutting out super-sharp
stone that looks as though it has been roughly carved by a
wickedly large set of claws.  A deep chill settles over the
corridor, made even deeper by the lack of light that creates
dim patches and dark shadows.
42063.name: A Curve in the Sub-Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
There is a T-Junction in the sewers here, where the three
directions of tunnels come together.  A channel is in the
center of the tunnel where sewage collects and runs toward
a grate further down the system.  The stench here is nearly
unbearable.
42016.name: A T-Junction in the Sewers

description: {x
The corridor seems to turn into nothing more than a tunnel
here - the bricks only randomly placed as though the builder
finally ran out.  A rank scent floats along the chilly breeze
that wafts from the west.
{x
42079.name: Final Turn in the Corridor

description: {x
{8T{whis pub is nothing more than a hole in the wall, full of
{8s{wawdust and peanut shells.  The plank wood walls are dark
{8a{wnd dingy and the entire place smells of stale beer.  A
{8c{wouple of tables sit in the middle of the bar.{x
{x
42085.name: {8F{wlam{8b{ward's {8P{wu{8b{x

description: {x
The massive tunnel comes to an end here at a brick wall that
sweats with the condensation of bodily waste and water.  The
slime that lines the wall hangs down in long tendrils, looking
much like greenish-brown snot.
42043.name: End of the Tunnel in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
A curve in the brick corridor opens up to a southern direction
and a slight breeze that brings with it a chill.  Torches hang
on the wall, their flames flickering and causing dancing shadows
along the length of the tunnel.  Crates and barrels sit along the
sides, some broken and empty.
42068.name: The Long Corridor

description: {x
The stone tunnel curves here with dim light shining on the rough-
hewn walls.  The chill in the air is more palpable here as the
tunnel winds farther into the earth.  The ground is littered with
rubble from the walls mixed with the footprints of halfling feet.
42053.name: A Turn in the Tunnel

description: {x
The cul-de-sac here is filthy dirty, bricks from the road are
missing, and the ones that aren't are cracked and stained.  The
homes that are on the road are more like hovels, run down and
dirty.  The air is a little chilly and smells very slightly of
sewage.
{x
42096.name: Flambard's Cove Cul-de-Sac

description: It is a disk of very heavy steel made to cover the
entrance to what looks and smells like a dank, nasty
sewer.
{x
The back of the Survival Pack Factory looks as expected.  Palattes
that are rotting and broken are strewn helter-skelter.  A large
green dumpster sits out here, filled to the brim with stinking
garbage and pack pieces that have been rejected.  Water sits in
stagnant puddles on the ground, collecting around a manhole that
sits partially open.
42000.name: Behind the Survival Pack Factory

description: {x
{8W{what a cesspit!  To say this kitchen is nasty is an understatement.
{8I{wt reeks of the scent of rancid cooking oil and squadrons of roaches
{8s{weem to patrol the walls, floors, counter surfaces, and even end up
{8o{wn the wrong side of the spatula.  The floor is red tile that looks
{8b{wlack with the thick layer of grease and grime.
{x
42088.name: {8F{wlam{8b{ward's {8C{waf{8e K{wit{8ch{we{8n{x

description: {x
The stone corridor runs east and west here, lined dimly with
far-spaced sconces.  Deep shadows sit between each light - a
perfect ambush point.  The smell of earth and sweat and stone
line the tunnel and the walls are filled with sharp edges of
rock.
42056.name: A Passageway Carved in Stone

description: {x
The smell of sewage miraculously vanishes here, replaced with the
smell of earth, stone, and sweat.  Lights line the walls of rough-
hewn stone walls.  It looks as though large claws have carved the
stone.  The ground is a mix of rubble and dirt, impacted by the
passage of small humanoid feet...
42047.name: Beneath the Sewers

description: {x
The sewer runs from the north to the south in a massive
brick-lined tunnel.  A channel sits in the center to
collect waste and funnel it to a grate farther in the
system.  The echoes of rat and roach feet seem to come
from everywhere at once, accompanied by the smell of raw
sewage.
42018.name: A Tunnel in the Sewers

description: {8|               {WFlambard's{8                 |
{x
Smuggler's Den Road is the main thoroughfare in the town and
is lined with bricks that are broken, cracked, and dirty.  Trash
lays scattered on the ground and along the walls of the buildings
long faded posters and flyers curl and hang lopsided off the
walls.  A {Ysign {wsits above the doorway of the building to the
east.{x
{x
42084.name: Smuggler's Den Road

description: {x
A steel ladder leads downward from a manhole at the top of the
tunnel and terminates here - in a very dank, dark, cess-filled
sewer pipe.  It is just as massive as its counterpart above, and
smells very much the same.  An occasional rumble can be heard from
some unknown source.
42031.name: Deeper into the Sewers

description: {x
The massive tunnel branches in three directions here, north, east,
and south.  The smell of sewage hangs in the air thickly along with
the darkness that infects every square inch of the space.  Echoes of
drips and scurrying feet come from all directions.
42027.name: A T-Junction in the Sewers

description: {8Welcome to Flambard's Cavity{x
{x
The ladder extends down the wall to the end of a brick-lined
street.  The cavern it opens to is enormous and contains a
myriad of buildings.  Streetlamps light the way in the chilly
subterranean air.  Everything is dirty, dark, and muted.
{x
An {Yarch {wspans the street with the name of the town in iron.{x
42081.name: Entrance to Flambard's Cavity

description: {x
The sewer tunnel curves to the south and east here in the
darkness that covers everything.  The smell of raw sewage
hangs thickly in the air, owing to the channel that runs in
the center of the tunnel, funnelling away the bodily waste
of the citizens that live above.
42041.name: A Bend in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
Darkness stretches like a wet blanket to the east and west in
the sewer tunnel, intertwined with the stench of raw sewage.
A channel in the center of the tunnel flows with waste, garbage,
and dead rodents.  Water and sewage drips from the very walls
and echoes off of everything.
42015.name: A Tunnel in the Sewers

description: {x
Grotto Street is a narrow, brick-lined road that is lined
with trash along the sides of the road.  The bricks are old
and dirty and some are missing.  Overhead the cavern yawns
into an abyss of darkness.  Street lamps light the way.
{x
42082.name: Grotto Street

description: {x
There isn't much to look at in this one-room shanty.  A
couch sits off to the side, it's middle sagging.  On the
walls are drawings of halfling thieves in various stages
of concealment.  The smell of rotting vegetation is heavy
in the air, as though the owner is hoarding food and not
eating it.
42097.name: A Tiny Halfing Shanty

description: {x
The massive tunnels run east, south, and west here in
utter darkness.  Echoes of rodents and roaches bounce
off the walls, along with an occasional rumbling growl
that can be heard from the bowels of the sewer itself.
42037.name: T-Junction in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The massive sewer tunnel bends here to the north and east.  The
sewage from above runs into a channel in the center of the tunnel
where not only does bodily waste flow, but garbage, and dead
animals from the topside.  The sounds of the sewer echo off the
walls and float upon the air with the stench of sewage.
42024.name: A Bend in the Sewers

description: {x
Torches along these walls flicker a bit more than the
rest as a chill breeze blows through.  Broken barrels
and crates lay scattered on the ground, covered in a
light dust.  Footprints can be seen as well, most fresh.
{x
42077.name: Along in the Deep Corridor

description: {x
The sewer smell is far behind as the smell of earth, stone
and sweat drifts through the rough-hewn corridor.  Lights
line the walls at a distance which leaves shadows between
each sconce.  The ground is a mix of rubble and dirt, full
of the footprints of small humanoid feet.
42048.name: A Tunnel Beneath the Sewers

description: {x
This house, if it can be called that, is deplorable.  Stacks of
newspapers fill the room, leaving only a narrow walkway to get
anywhere.  One match and the place would flame to the sky.  The
smell of rotting food and perhaps a decaying rat or two fills the
space.
42094.name: A Ramshackle Residence

description: {x
The very tunnel itself seems to shift and the sound of
grating stone can be heard loudly echoing off the walls.
The smell of stone, sweat, and earth fills the air and a
slight chill drifts through the dimly lit corridor.
42051.name: A Shift Beneath the Sewers

description: {x
The tunnel ends here at a bricked over wall that weeps with
the condensation of sewage and water.  Algae clings to the
bricks, loaded down with the slime of raw sewage.  The smell
that fills the air is that of bodily waste, garbage, and
things long dead and decayed.
42017.name: End of the Tunnel

description: {x
This single room house is scarcely more clean than the other
homes in this row.  The carpet is a nasty shade of foot-traffic
gray, and is almost identical to the nasty couch that sits along
the western wall.  A blanket and pillow sit on the couch, a make-
shift bed for the owner of the residence.  The smell of cigarette
smoke fills the dingy room.
42095.name: A Run-down Hovel

description: {x
This room literally has a sewagefall in the center that starts
at the top of the tunnel where a grate from the upper level of
the sewer releases its contents.  Droplets of raw sewage spray
outward, landing on the walls and in the channel beneath.  The
stench here is thick and nearly unbearable.
42036.name: Sewage Falls...

description: {x
The tunnel of rough-hewn stone bends here, the small cones of
light from the distantly spaced sconces reflecting off the sides
and making deep shadows.  The ground is comprised of rubble from
eroding walls as well as dirt from the earth itself, and is full
of footprints from halfling-sized feet.
42054.name: A Bending Turn in the Tunnel

description: {x
The passageway comes to an abrupt end where, over a steep ledge,
a ladder leads downward.  Dim light comes up from the abyss, casting
long shadows over the jagged edges of the walls.  The chill in
the air is palpable, and lingers with the scent of earth, sweat,
and stone.
42064.name: End of the Subterranean Passageway

description: {x
The tunnel curves here and grows slightly darker as the
lights grow farther apart.  The rough-hewn stone gives off
a slight chill, adding to the air with the scent of earth,
and sweat.  The ground is littered with rubble and dirt.
42050.name: A Curve in the Tunnel

description: {x
The rough-hewn stone sticks out at sharp angles and offers
a deep chill to the air.  The scent of earth and stone and
sweat hangs in the air, hanging thickly over the dimly lit
ground that consists of rubble and earth.  The footprints
of halflings fill the tunnel.
42059.name: Part of the Stone Passageway

description: {RWARNING:
{x
{8You have entered the sewers of New Beginnings, where only
{8those who have obtained knowledge through adventure may
{8tread.  If you have not obtained level 15 in your studies,
{8you may wish to leave now.  {RYOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!{x
{x
A long steel ladder reaches up toward a manhole cover.  Drips
of an unknown liquid fall from the cover above, causing the
ladder to rust in many places.  The smell is dank and sour and
no light penetrates from above.  Sewage runs in a deep rivulet
in the center of the tunnel, populated by a myriad of different
types of debris.  A {Rsign {wsits off to the side of the ladder
lit by a tiny floating flame.
42001.name: Opening to the Sewers

description: {yA large wooden barrel sits here, full of an unknown liquid.{x
{yA wooden crate sits here, dusty from disuse and empty.{x
{yA wooden crate sits here, dusty from disuse and empty.{x
{x
The ladder from above enters into a long corridor which, unlike
the one above, is lined with red bricks.  Mortar long dried hangs
out from the brickwork, making the walls rough and uneven.  Iron
sconces line the walls, laden with torches which light the way.
Wooden crates and barrels can be seen along the walls.
42065.name: Start of a Long Winding Corridor

description: {8|               {WFlambard's{8                 |
{8|               {W  Cafe   {8                  |
{x
Bricks that line this road that are broken and cracked, and
some are missing in places.  Trash lays along the road, every-
thing from old papers to used condoms.  To the west is a ram-
shackle building with a {Ysign {wabove the door.
{x
42086.name: Smuggler's Den Road

description: {x
The corridor ends here at a hole in the ground.  A rusty and
rickety ladder pokes out from the depths and a constant stir
of chill air flows along the ground.  A single torch lights
the area, flickering in the breeze.
{x
42080.name: End of the Corridor!

description: {x
This cul-de-sac leads to houses that look so run down and
dirty as to look as though they are unlivable.  A few of
the street lamps are out, casting shadows on the road.  The
bricks in the street are shabby, old, and covered in trash.
{x
42093.name: Flambard's Hole Cul-de-Sac

description: {x
Crates and wooden barrels litter the sides of this corridor and
create long shadows that seem to dance in the flickering torch-
light.  A chill breeze wafts lazily through the tunnel that seems
to linger on the bricks that line the walls.
42069.name: Within the Corridor

description: {x
The sewer tunnel smells faintly of beer here, overriding
only by an impossible margin the rank odor of raw sewage.
Debris and excrement flow in the center of the large pipe,
and various rodents, insects, and other beasts happily
scurry along in their sewer home.
42020.name: A Bend in the Sewers

description: {x
Made of random boards that appear to have come from the
myriad of crates in the upper levels of the sewers, this
house barely holds together.  A couple of chairs sit off
to the side at a table that is propped up with sugar pack-
ets.  The smell of body odor and stale beer is strong here.
42098.name: A Medium-Sized Shack

description: {x
The corridor seems to run on endlessly.  The torches that
line the walls flicker in the chill breeze that oozes down
the walls and rolls along the floors.  Broken barrels and
crates line the way, as though there were once a lot of
deliveries that were made long, long ago.
{x
42072.name: Within the Corridor

description: {x
This black tunnel of darkness and degradation runs beneath the
Survival Pack Factory.  The stench of sewage and trash is just
as thick as the darkness that hangs in the air.  A tube sits to
the north, a flume for the waste from the factory above.  In the
middle of the tunnel is a channel for waste to collect and be
banished to the river.
42004.name: Beneath the Factory

description: {x
The corridor curves back toward the west here, going to the
north as well.  A chill breeze seems to come from the very
bricks that line the way, the mortar dried in oozing patterns.
Torches flicker with dim firelight along the length of the
walkway.
42071.name: A Curve in the Corridor

description: {x
The massive tunnel that runs east to west here is steeped
in pitch black darkness.  A channel runs in the middle of
the tunnel, full of raw sewage and garbage from the citizens
above.  Sounds of scurrying feet and dripping water seems to
come from everywhere at once.
42011.name: In a Massive Sewer Tunnel

description: {RTREAD CAREFULLY:
{x
{8If you are not one of our own, and we find
{8you in the bowels of our territory, your death
{8will be the mercy for which you beg.{x
{x
The pile of bricks has given way to a room that is no larger
than a closet.  Bricks along the walls hang out, haphazardly
creating walls with jutting edges.  A single lightbulb hangs
in the center of the room, illuminating a manhole on the ground
and a sign that leans against the wall.
42046.name: A Secret Passageway in the Sewers

description: {x
The massive tunnel comes to an end here at a large brick
wall that weeps with the condensation of sewage.  Algae
sits upon the bricks like a slime, thick with the stench
of the bodily waste that fills the channel in the center
of the tunnel.
42019.name: End of the Tunnel

description: {x
The corridor littered with crates and barrels runs east and
west here.  Occasionally, the sound of feet can be heard, but
it is uncertain whether the be that of rat, halfling, or...
something else.  The chill in the air is deep and clings to
the brick-lined walls.
42067.name: Farther Into the Corridor

description: {x
Trash lays all along the road here, filling in the holes that
are left behind from the missing bricks.  The whole lane is
dirty and is dimly lit by the street lights along the sides.
A shack of a house sits to the east.
{x
42089.name: Smuggler's Den Road

description: {x
The tunnel follows a north-south line here in utter darkness.
Sounds of scurrying rat feet echo off the walls as well as the
stippled sound of cockroaches scattering to and fro.  The smell
is like a wet blanket that lays over everything, smothering all
with its stench.
42006.name: Large Tunnel in the Sewers

description: {x
The smell of earth, stone, and sweat floats along this
corridor.  Lights line the walls at a distance far enough
apart to leave shadows between each sconce.  The corridor
is rough-hewn, looking as if a massive set of claws
belonging to an animal that is, hopefully, long gone.
42049.name: A Tunnel Beneath the Sewers

description: {x
The tunnel comes to an abrupt halt here at a brick wall that
weeps with sewer condensation, algae, and slime.  Rats and
roaches populate this small outlet, the sounds of their feet
echoing off of the brick walls along with the sound of running
sewage.
42044.name: End of the Tunnel in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
The sewer tunnel ends here at a weeping brick wall, wet with
water, sewage condensation, and algae.  The stench of sewage
sits in the air along with a darkness so thick it is palpable.
Echoes of dripping water and vermin feet come from everywhere.
42023.name: End of the Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
The passageway curves from the east to the north here, the
chill growing ever so cooler here.  Barrels line the walkway,
some broken, others still filled with some unknown liquid.
Torches line the walls, dimly lighting the way with their fires.
{x
42074.name: A Turn in the Corridor

description: {x
The sewers go in opposing directions, north, east, and south
here.  The darkness is still thick and coupled with the pungent
scent of the sewage that runs in a stream down the center of
the tunnel.  The sound of dripping water, scurrying rodent feet,
and the swift sextupled-beat of roach feet echoes from every-
where at once.
42007.name: T-Junction in the Sewers

description: {x
The massive brick tunnel curves here from the south and west
in the darkness.  Echoes of vermin feet can be heard scurrying
here and there, as well as the drips of water and sewage.  A
metal ladder leans against a wall leading up to a manhole
above.
42014.name: A Bend in the Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
The passageway curves here, the rough-hewn stone walls jutting
haphazardly in the dim light.  Stone, sweat, and earth mingle
together to create a musky scent that fills the tunnel.  A chill
sits in the air, owing to the depth at which this passageway
has been built.
42057.name: A Curve in the Passageway

description: {x
In the spreading blanket of darkness the massive sewer tunnel
branches in four directions, north, east, south, and west.  The
sewage in the center of the tunnels runs to this point and down
a steel grate that takes it to further reaches of the sewer
system.  The smell of the conjoining channels is overwhelming and
almost seems alive with its palpability.
42012.name: Quadruple Junction in the Sewer

description: {x
The massive sewer tunnel curves to the north and east here, the
darkness that fills it making it nearly impossible to determine
even that bit of information.  A channel of raw sewage runs along
to the north, filled with bodily waste, garbage, and dead animals.
The echoes of falling water, rats, and roaches can be heard.
42038.name: A Bend in the Deeper Sewers

description: {RWARNING:
{x
{8Below this manhole are horrors untold.  If you
{8plan to adventure in this cess pit of despair,
{8be warned that there is no way to return to the
{8world above, save through finding your own way
{8back.  If you have not obtained an adventuring
{8level of at least 25, you may wish to stay clear
{8of the depths of darkness that will unfold here.
{x
{RYOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!{x
{x
The massive sewer tunnel ends here.  A manhole sits off to
one side of the tunnel, wet with raw sewage.  Rodents and
roaches make this corner of the sewer home, and their feet
can be heard in the echoes of the tunnel.  A {Rsign{w sits
off to the side of the manhole cover.
42021.name: End of the Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
Bricks line the walls, the mortar holding them together once
oozing now dry.  Torches flicker in the presence of a chill
breeze and cast shadows along the walls.  Broken crate pieces
line the walkway, covered in a very light dust.
{x
42073.name: Midway in the Corridor

description: {x
The brick-lined corridor stretches north and south, lined with
flickering torches that light the way with dim firelight.  Along
the walls are empty crates and barrels, some smashed and broken
open.  A chill breeze seems to flow from the bricks themselves.
{x
42070.name: In a Long Corridor

description: {x
Smuggler's Den Road comes to an end here, spreading out to
the east and west and leading toward several shacks and
houses.  The road is dingy and dirty, filled with trash that
covers the bricks.  Overhead, the cavern reaches high enough
to disappear into darkness.
{x
42090.name: Smuggler's Den Junction

description: {x
A large bend in the brick and mortar sewer tunnel curves from
the north to the east.  In the center of the bend is a channel
that funnels sewage toward a grate and the river beyond.  The
darkness and stench of waste bends the atmosphere to its will,
threatening to choke airways and blind adventurers.
42022.name: A Bend in the Sewers

description: {x
The tunnel here curves, causing the rough-hewn stone to jut out
in various directions.  The walls are sharp and look as though
they have been carved out by a massive beast with massive claws.
The smell of earth, sweat, and stone fill the air, coupled with
chill that seems to get deeper.
42060.name: A Sub-Sewer Passageway

description: {x
This passageway beneath the sewers is dimly lit - each light
separated so far as to create deep shadows between each.  The
smell of earth, sweat, and stone fills the air, accompanied by
a very deep chill that seems to grow colder the farther one
progresses.
42061.name: A Passageway Deep Beneath the Sewers

description: {x
The sewer tunnel runs north to south, flowing with a channel
of sewage at its very heart.  The brick walls are coated with
the condensation of waste material, and echo with the sounds
of roaches, rodents, and dripping water.
42033.name: A Massive Tunnel in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
A darkness hangs within this massive sewer tunnel as it exits
north, east, and west.  Raw sewage floats in the center of the
tunnel, breeding a stench so thick it threatens to fill up lungs
and choke airways.  Roaches and rats scurry to and fro, their
legs tapping along the bricks, echoing in the dark.
42010.name: A T-Junction in the Sewers

description: {x
Yet another T-junction exists here in the sewers, the massive
tunnels going north, east, and west.  In the center of the
tunnels a channel full of raw sewage flows, carrying with it
the scent of waste, garbage, and decay.  The brick walls weep
with the condensation from not only the sewage, but the ground
beyond.
42035.name: T-Junction in the Deeper Sewers

{8T{whis store is small, but that better not be said aloud.
{8A {wsmall counter sits to the north of the shop.  In the
{8o{wpen floor a few shelves are set up with trinkets.  On
{8t{whe walls are sketches of halflings with their faces
{8h{widden behind masks.{x
{x
{8A {Ysign {whangs at the back of the store.
{x
42091.name: {8F{wlam{8b{ward's {8C{wac{8he{x

description: {8|               {WFlambard's{8                 |
{8|               {W  Cache  {8                  |
{x
Grotto Street and Smuggler's Den Road intersect here.  Bricks
line the streets, broken and cracked and covered over with
trash.  Street lamps line the roads, the glass on their posts
dark with the soot from the flames within.  A building with a
{Ysign{x sits to the north.
{x
42083.name: Grotto Street at Smuggler's Den Road

description: {x
The sound of scurrying rodent and roach feet echoes off the
walls with the sound of dripping and running sewage.  The
stench of bodily waste and garbage sits heavily in the air,
threatening to choke airways.  Darkness spreads in both dir-
ections like a wet wool blanket.
42009.name: In a Massive Sewer Tunnel

description: {x
The tunnel extends to the east and west here, the rough-hewn
stone hanging out in jagged teeth-like formations.  The lights
in the corridor are spaced very far apart as to make the whole
of the tunnel dimly lit with sharp shadows between each sconce.
42055.name: A Dimly Lit Tunnel Passageway

description: {x
The corridor curves here and bends into an even smaller
section.  The bricks seem haphazardly laid here, as though
the original builder grew tired of even stacking them
decently.  The chill is a bit deeper here and fills the
whole of the walkway.
{x
42076.name: Curve in the Corridor

description: {x
There is a bend here in the massive sewer tunnel that runs
beneath the Survival Pack Factory.  A channel sits in the
center of the floor of the tunnel where sewage collects and
flows away.  The thick stench of sewage and debris clogs the
air and sticks to every surface it comes in contact with.  To
the south stretches nothing but darkness.
42005.name: Bend in the Tunnel

description: {x
The massive sewer tunnels go to the north, south, and west
here, sewage running from all directions to the center
channel.  The darkness is palpable here and punctuated with
the scent of raw sewage and the sound of vermin scurrying
as quickly as they can.
42008.name: T-Junction in the Sewers

description: {x
The corridor curves here, the walls jutting out haphazardly,
the stone precariously sharp.  Rubble lays over the ground
mixed with the earth and full of tiny humanoid footprints.
A chill hangs in the air, growing colder as one travels
through the tunnel.
42062.name: A Curve in the Passageway

description: {x
The massive tunnels split into three directions, heading north,
east, and west.  The darkness is palpable, and accentuated by
the sound of dripping water, running sewage, and vermin that
populate the tunnels.  The smell that sits over everything is
nearly enough to choke even the most stalwart of adventurers.
42040.name: T-Junction in the Deeper Sewers

description: {x
{8T{whis cafe is so far from what an actual cafe is, it is a
{8w{wonder it's considered an eating establishment at all.
{8T{whe floor is carpeted, but the carpet is nothing more than
{8a {wdirty mat of tramped down fibers.  The thick stench of
{8o{wld cooking grease seems to sweat from the pores of the
{8b{wuilding and lingers on the wooden walls in a sticky
{8r{wesidue.  A window sits to the north for patrons to place
{8t{wheir orders.{x
42087.name: {8F{wlam{8b{ward's {8C{waf{8e{x

description: {x
This residence is a tiny hovel, a single room that is run-down
and smells of unwashed body.  Cigarette butts lay on the carpet,
on the table, and overflow the ash trays.  Porn magazines lay
all around, some of their pages stuck together.  The walls are
a dingy color of blue, offset by the ratty couch that sits on
eastern wall.
42092.name: Flambard's Residence

description:
{yThey will survive Toril's annihilation, and may
{ywell be there for yours.{x
42000.room_name: A giant cockroach scurries along in the darkness of the sewers.
42000.name: a {8gi{wa{8nt {ycock{rroa{ych{x~

description:
{8Seriously... I don't think they could get any larger
{8and still be called "rats."  Black beady eyes search
{8hungrily in the darkness for any spare food - including
{8live food.{x
42001.room_name: A huge rat paces along the tunnels, looking for food.

description:
{8Dressed in black leather with jet-black dreads, this halfling 
{8means business.  He holds a long spear, tipped with a razor-
{8sharp point.  A black mask covers his face and a thick hide
{8protects him from harm.{x
42010.room_name: A halfling wielding a long spear helps to defend its home!
42010.name: {8a sp{wea{Wr-w{wield{8ing {yhal{8f{yling{x~

description:
{8Dressed in black leather with jet-black dreads, this halfling
{8means business.  She holds a broad axe, the sides glimmering
{8with a high shine.  A black mask covers her face and a thick
{8hide protects her from harm.{x
42011.room_name: A halfling wielding a broad axe helps to defend its home!
42011.name: {8an ax{we-w{Wie{wldi{8ng {yhal{8f{yling{x~

description:
{8Dressed in tight black leather with jet-black dreads pulled into
{8a ponytail, this halfling means business.  He holds a sharp sword,
{8the edges glinting maliciously.  A black mask covers his face and
{8a thick hide protects him from harm.{x
42012.room_name: A halfling wielding a long sword helps to defend its home!
42012.name: {8a sw{word-w{Wie{wldi{8ng {yhal{8f{yling{x~

description:
{8Dressed in tight black leather with tiny black dreads, this
{8halfling means business.  She holds a mace that looks as if
{8it is capable of delivering a hearty beating.  A black mask
{8covers her face and a thick hide protects her from harm.{x
42013.room_name: A halfling wielding a mace helps to defend its home!
42013.name: {8a ma{wce-w{Wie{wldi{8ng {yhal{8f{yling{x~

description:
{yThis stinking hideous monstrosity is an ettin and it stands
{yroughly 10 feet tall.  It's legs are as thick as tree trunks,
{yand its arms are just as thick.  On its shoulders sit two
{yheads that look almost orcish in appearance, jutted tusks, pig-
{ylike snouts, and four beady black eyes that have an uncanny
{yknack for seeing everything.  The stench of this foul beast
{yis so heavy it threatens to choke, and the filth on its skin
{yis so thick it almost looks like a hide.{x
42014.room_name: A two-headed ettin stands here, chained to the wall and jibbering to itself incessantly.
42014.name: {ya la{8rg{we{y ma{8l{ye et{wt{8i{yn{x~

F vul K

description: Not letting you up in case you are down.
42015.name: Nowayjose100~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M exall 42004 4~

description:
{8Tolman stands roughly three feet tall.  His hair is pulled back
{8into dreadlocks and his green eyes peer out at every customer
{8that comes in.  It's no far stretch to realize he knows a lot
{8that goes on in these parts, and might part with information for
{8a price.{x
42016.room_name: A halfling man stands behind the counter, eyeing you.
42016.name: {8T{wo{8lman La{wv{8inhand{x~

description:
{8Obviously this "little man" doesn't take kindly to strangers,
{8especially not those that wander into his place of business
{8and expect a drink.  But he loves coin a little too much to
{8outright turn them away...{x
42017.room_name: A halfling barkeep stands behind the bar, glaring at you.
42017.name: {8Po{wt{8sdan {wB{8ee{wr{8hand{x~
42017.keywords: Potsdan Beerhand man male halfling barkeep~

description:
{8All the halflings of Flambard's Cavity know Alice because,
{8frankly, she's a little easy.  It doesn't bother the many
{8customers, however, as Alice doesn't discriminate.  She is
{8a no-nonsense halfing with a quick wit and a keen eye.{x
42018.room_name: A stocky halfling woman chews gum and waits for your order.
42018.name: {8A{wlice {8W{waitinghand{x~

description:
{8Short in both height and temper.  This halfling doesn't
{8seem happy with this life at all.{x
42019.room_name: A halfling cook stands here, sweating into the food.
42019.name: {8a ha{wl{8fli{wn{8g co{wo{8k{x~
42019.t_flags: T {8Work and slave, slave and work... where's my life, huh?{x~

description:
{8If ever there were a portly, stocky, hairy halfing,
{8Frank would be it.  He actually sports a beard that
{8is braided.  He has a cigarette in his mouth that 
{8leaves ashes everywhere, including in the food.  His
{8white apron is soiled with grease and food bits.{x
42020.room_name: A very portly halfling stands overseeing his kitchen.
42020.name: {8Fra{wn{8k Bak{we{8hand{x~
42020.keywords: Frank Bakehand halfing male chef man~

description:
{8Flambard is dressed in jet black leathers and sports a
{8black bandana over his long dreads.  One of his eyes is
{8missing, but he doesn't bother covering it up, letting its
{8bright pink scar tissue peer out at all who visit.  He 
{8looks like a biker in miniature, but his raging temper is
{8far from tiny.{x
42021.room_name: A halfling man named Flambard sits here on the couch, counting money.
42021.name: {8Fla{wmb{8ar{wd{8 W{wa{8rha{wn{8d{x~

description:
{8Mean, lean, short, and wearing a head full of dreadlocks.
{8Watch your wallets and purses...{x
42022.room_name: A halfling thief walks the streets with a very swift pace.
42022.name: {8a hal{wf{8li{wn{8g thi{we{8f{x~

description: {8Yep... he's all about newspapers.  Newspapers and money.{x
42023.room_name: A halfing hoarder stands here, stacking his newspapers.
42023.name: {8a ha{wl{8fli{wn{8g ho{war{8der{x~

description:
{8She looks rather tired, but that could just be
{8part of her disguise...{x
42024.room_name: A halfling woman rests on her couch, reading a book.
42024.name: {8a ha{wlf{8ling w{wom{8an{x~

description:
{8Whew!  Who knows when the last time this halfling had a
{8bath was, but the stench is nearly unbearable.  He sits
{8in what could presumably be his own vomit, muttering to
{8himself about exploits long past.{x
42025.room_name: A halfling sits at the table, drunk off his ass.
42025.name: {8a dr{wu{8nk ha{wlf{8lin{wg{x~

description:
{8Feed the children... ah, this poor little halfling has never
{8seen a feast, never seen a fresh piece of food.  But if you
{8had to hedge your bets, you might consider the fact that your
{8wallet could certainly feed the children... and this kid knows
{8it, too.{x
42026.room_name: A small halfling child stands here, eating stale bread.
42026.name: {8a sma{wll {8hal{wfl{8ing ch{wi{8ld{x~

description:
{yIt looks pretty sick... its hair is gone in patches,
{yits eyes are milky with cataracts, and it might even
{ybe missing a tooth or three...{x
42027.room_name: A dog roams the streets, eating what garbage it can find.
42027.name: {ya sc{8u{rr{yvy d{wo{yg{x~

description:
{8It's a cat, it looks half starved.
{x
42028.room_name: An alley cat quickly slinks along the street.
42028.name: {8an {ral{rl{8ey {wca{8t{x~
